name: gasify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change plants or coal into gas using a special process: Power plants that gasify coal are better because they are cleaner. The most efficient solution to recycling waste may be to gasify it and turn it into heat and power.
More examplesFewer examplesCoal can be made carbon-free, using advanced power plants that gasify the fuel.The power plant uses a new technology that gasifies coal, and that can dramatically reduce emissions.It's not only coal that can be gasified; you could also make the same fuel with plants.These power stations gasify coal and capture 90% of sulphur emissions.
